attributes.action: offer covid vaccination to 12+ prioritising those eligibly for flu vaccine
attributes.additional_details: those 12+ identified as vulnerable to flu and on the flu vaccine list each year should be offered pfizer vaccine asap in preperation for winter and sept school return.
attributes.background: offer pfizer vaccination to 12+ prioritising those eligibly for flu vaccine and 16+

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/589254

We can't accept petitions calling for specific vaccines to be made available to particular groups.
